ThingDef.Name: hongdeng1
ThingDef.Desc: 精美的照明建筑，会在夜晚点亮，照亮周围。

ThingDef.Name: shujixinghuangdeng
ThingDef.Desc: 金莲万朵，无物可破；诸邪避退，万法不侵。

ThingDef.Name: qinglianbaosedeng
ThingDef.Desc: 舍利毫光，宁心静气；诸邪避退，万法不侵。

ThingDef.Name: suseyunjiedeng
ThingDef.Desc: 奇象氤氲，天地皆明；诸邪避退，万法不侵。

ThingDef.Name: lidiyanguangdeng
ThingDef.Desc: 混乱阴阳，颠倒五行；诸邪避退，万法不侵。

ThingDef.Name: zhenwuzaodiaodeng
ThingDef.Desc: 朦胧乾坤，遮天蔽日；诸邪避退，万法不侵。
